definition[0]: a worker who is in charge of a group of other workers, for example in a factory
definition[1]: the leader of a jury, who announces their decision in court
definition[2]: a man who is in charge of a group of workers, for example in a factory
example[1]: the foreman of a building site
definition[3]: a person who is the leader of a JURY (=the group of ordinary people who decide whether someone is guilty in some courts of law)
example[2]: The foreman of the jury read out the verdict to the packed courtroom.
